chapter.title: The command line
chapter.programlisting: $ coffeepot --help Usage: coffeepot [options] The input Options: -c, --compiled-grammar Save the compiled grammar -D, --describe-ambiguity Describe why a parse is ambiguous Default: false -g, --grammar The input grammar -G, --graph-svg Output an SVG graph of the forest --graph-xml Output an XML description of the forest -help, -h, --help Display help -i, --input The input --no-output Don't print the output Default: false -o, --output The output, or stdout -p, --parse Select a parse, or all parses -pp, --pretty-print Pretty-print (indent) the output Default: false --show-chart Show the underlying Earley chart Default: false --show-grammar Show the underlying Earley grammar Default: false -t, --time Display timing information Default: false -T, --tree-svg Output an SVG graph of the parse tree --tree-xml Output an XML description of the parse tree -v, --verbose Verbose output Default: false
